title: Fire threat

abstract: A young mother's experiences of the 'Black Saturday' bushfires of February 2009.
description: A young mum recounts her stress at her partner deciding to stay in Warburton while she and her young daughter go to her mum's house. She speaks about her 'uni days' and the change in priorities now that she is a mum.
